com.jtechdev.macwidgets

Class WidgetStandardColorScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jtechdev.macwidgets.WidgetStandardColorScheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WidgetColorScheme

    public class WidgetStandardColorScheme
extends java.lang.Object
implements WidgetColorScheme
    A WidgetColorScheme that provides Painters and colors
